content:
T.P.(C) NO. 647 OF 2024
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
 CIVIL ORIGINAL JURISDICTION   
TRANSFER PETITION (CIVIL) NO. 647 OF 2024
REKHA SHARMA                                       Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
ABHISHEK CHATURVEDI                                Respondent(s)
O R D E R 
1.The petitioner-wife has filed the petition under Section 25 of
the Code of Civil Procedure, 1908 before this Court seeking
transfer of divorce petition bearing HMA No. 94 of 2023 titled as
“Abhishek Chaturvedi vs. Mrs. Rekha Sharma” pending before the
Court of Additional District Judge No. 1, Gangapur City, Gangapur
City District, Rajasthan to the Court of Principal Judge, Family
Court, New Delhi, Patiala House Court. 
2.Having heard learned counsel for the parties and taking into
consideration the grounds taken in the transfer petition, we allow
the transfer petition and direct the transfer of case bearing HMA
No. 94 of 2023 titled as “Abhishek Chaturvedi vs. Mrs. Rekha
Sharma” pending before the Court of Additional District Judge No.
1, Gangapur City, Gangapur City District, Rajasthan to the Court of
1T.P.(C) NO. 647 OF 2024
Principal Judge, Family Court, New Delhi, Patiala House Court. 
3.Let the record of the case be transferred without delay.
4.A copy of this order be sent to the concerned court for
compliance. 
5.If  video  conferencing  facility  is  available  with  the
transferee Court, the benefit of the same shall be extended to the
parties.
6.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of.
    …………………………………………………………………………J.
    [PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA ]
…………………………………………………………………………J.
[R. MAHADEVAN]
NEW DELHI;
  July 03, 2025
2T.P.(C) NO. 647 OF 2024
ITEM NO.2               COURT NO.12               SECTION XV
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Transfer Petition(s)(Civil)  No(s).  647/2024
REKHA SHARMA                                       Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
ABHISHEK CHATURVEDI                                Respondent(s)
[ MEDIATION REPORT RECEIVED ] 
IA No. 57382/2024 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 57383/2024 - STAY APPLICATION
 
Date : 03-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
(PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Petitioner(s) :Mr. Aditya Jain, AOR
                   Ms. Srika Selvam, Adv.
                   Mr. Mohit Kumar Sharma, Adv.
                                      
For Respondent(s) :Mr. Snehasish Mukherjee, AOR
                   Mr. Maneesh, Adv.
                   Mr. Harish Kaushik, Adv.
                   Mr. Mohd Mohsin Raja, Adv.
                   Mr. Bal Kishan Sharma, Adv.
                   Mr. Chanchal Kaushik, Adv.
                   Mr. Asit Kumar Roy, Adv.
                   Mr. Krishan Mahajan, Adv.                       
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1.The Transfer Petition is allowed in terms of the signed order.
2.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of. 
(KAPIL TANDON)                                  (NIDHI WASON)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
(Signed Order is placed on the file.)
3
